item.description: We're extremely flattered and excited that our friends at chef have donated a place on their upcoming Chef Fundamentals Workshop as a prize at our meetup tomorrow. The training is worth a £1000 and is two day instructor-taught training teaching you how to write infrastructure code in chef. Overview of Chef Workstation Setup Node Setup Dissecting your first Chef run Introducing the Node object Chef resources and recipes Attributes, templates, and cookbook dependencies Template variables, notifications, and controlling idempotency Recipe inclusion, data bags, and search roles Environments Using community cookbooks Further resources More details can be found at http://www.
